subtitleNullable: Customer Reviews of US Ski Areas for NLP and other uses
descriptionNullable:
### Context

I wanted to do explore some NLP using review/ratings information. Subsequently, I scrapped these data from the onthesnow.com website for ski area ratings and reviews for over 300 ski areas in the US. 


### Content

These file contains 6 attributes for each row and contains over 16k reviews.
The **State** column represents the State in which the ski area for which the review was provided is located. 
The **Ski Area** column represents the name of the ski area for which a review was provided.
The **Reviewer Name** column represents the reviewer's name for the review provided in the event that they opted to provide a name
The **Review Date** column represents the date which the review was entered into the On The Snow website. 
The **Review Star Rating (out of 5)** column represents the star rating out a possible 5 stars the reviewer left for their ski area review. 
The **Review Text ** column represents the text of the review
title: OnTheSnow Ski Area Reviews
subtitle: Customer Reviews of US Ski Areas for NLP and other uses
